Class JobRequest

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class JobRequest
extends ExecutionEnvironmentDTO
    All information needed to make a request to run a new job.
    Since:
    3.0.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
